Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted WB: 87th, State, 83rd, Holland, and 87th; EB: 87th, Holland, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th near 87th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 87th/Lafayette, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, State, 83rd, Holland, and 87th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 87th, Holland, 83rd, Lafayette, and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.
